meanings.definition: A tightly rolled bundle of tobacco leaves for smoking.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather enjoys smoking cigars on the porch.
meanings.sent2: The shop had a wide selection of cigars from different countries.
meanings.sent3: When the magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, it was actually a cigar in disguise!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cigars filled the room, creating a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The cigar smoke lingered in the air, leaving a pleasant scent behind.

meanings.definition: A cylindrical roll of tobacco for smoking, smaller than a cigar.
meanings.sent1: She prefers mini cigars because they are easier to carry around.
meanings.sent2: The party favors included small cigars for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The tiny cigars looked like little chocolate bars at first glance.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth as a small cigar, calming everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The mini cigars were a hit at the event, with everyone wanting more.
